about_the_game:
Clean up your farm and start by sewing your first seed. Progress your farm by cleaning it up, working the land and bringing it into the future. Manual labor is slow but with the advances in technology creeping their way into Blissful Acres, you will find yourself automating your farm for maximum output.

Features
  • Farming. Your farm is your life. Strategically build it for efficiency and safety. Animals will destroy your fences, the sun will dry up your crops, deer will eat your crops. Your crops can have randomized traits that can be extracted and added to other plants!
  • Skills. Every node you mine, every tree you cut, every crop you sew and harvest all gain you experience! The more skillful you become, the more you will be able to do!
  • Townsfolk. Blissful Acres is full of interesting townsfolk. Spend some time getting to know them. Maybe they'll give you an item, advice or choose to shop at your store over a competitors!
  • Competition. Its not as simple as just selling your goods. You have to out-sell your competitors! Set your prices, curse your competition and make good relationships with the locals to ensure your old produce stand thrives!
  • Exploration. Explore and battle with enemies in a procedurally generated cave system. The rarest of items exist within these depths and its up to you to explore and find items that will enrich your farm!
  • Enchantment. High quality items are key in everything you do in Blissful Acres. Better armor will save you from the depths. Better tools will allow you to manipulate the landscape quickly and effectively. In Blissful Acres, there is no ceiling! You can infinitely enchant your items!
  • Decoration. Use tiles, decorations and lights to make your farm truly yours. A unique farm for a unique farmer!

short_description: Blissful Acres: Immersive Farming RPG! Slay monsters in a vibrant world with quests & secrets. Cultivate crops, automate tasks. Invest riches to expand farm & upgrade gear. Wield powerful weapons against foes. Unique blend of farming & action-packed adventures for epic odyssey!
